title: Testimonials
subtitle: What my clients and collaborators say

testimonials.name: CÃ©dric Lemaire
testimonials.content: I am writing these few lines to warmly recommend Thibaut, who worked as an apprentice in our company for 2 years. During his contract, Thibaut demonstrated great adaptability and unwavering commitment. He showed great autonomy while being an active member of our team. His initiative and problem-solving skills were particularly appreciated. His sociability and empathy make Thibaut an asset to any team.

testimonials.name: Jean-Claude Ravineau
testimonials.content: Thibaut perfectly understood my expectations in creating my professional website. He shows listening skills and adaptability to a field he didn't know. It was a pleasure to collaborate with him, I recommend him without hesitation.
